context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

author.description: Limit result set to posts assigned to specific authors.

author_exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes posts assigned to specific authors.

before.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

slug.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

status.description: Limit result set to posts assigned one or more statuses.

categories.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

categories_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the categories taxonomy.

tags.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

tags_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the tags taxonomy.

sticky.description: Limit result set to items that are sticky.

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the object.

password.description: A password to protect access to the content and excerpt.

author.description: The ID for the author of the object.

featured_media.description: The ID of the featured media for the object.

comment_status.description: Whether or not comments are open on the object.

ping_status.description: Whether or not the object can be pinged.

sticky.description: Whether or not the object should be treated as sticky.

template.description: The theme file to use to display the object.

categories.description: The terms assigned to the object in the category taxonomy.

tags.description: The terms assigned to the object in the post_tag taxonomy.
